start.content:
#!/bin/bash
PID_FILE=/tmp/node_red.pid
export PID_FILE
. /home/engines/functions/trap.sh

npm config set strict-ssl false
 if ! test -z $title
 then
  title_option="--title $title"
 fi
if ! test -f /home/app/settings.js
 then

cat /home/app/settings.js.head /home/fs/node-red-data/auth.js /home/app/settings.js.tail > /home/app/settings.js
fi


node-red $title_option --userDir /home/fs/node-red-data/ -s /home/app/settings.js &
echo $! >/tmp/node_red.pid

touch /engines/var/run/flags/startup_complete
wait
rm /engines/var/run/flags/startup_complete

install.content:
#!/bin/bash
npm config set strict-ssl false
echo '{"password":"_Engines_Environment(password)"}' |/home/actionators/set_admin_password.sh

if ! test -z $view_password
 then
echo '{"view_password":"_Engines_Environment(view_password)","view_username":"_Engines_Environment(view_username)"}' |/home/actionators/set_view_user.sh

fi

input.label: View User
input.title: Leave blank for no auth on view

script.content:
#!/bin/bash
. /home/engines/functions/params_to_env.sh
parms_to_env
encrypt=`echo $password | node-red-admin hash-pw | cut -f2 -d" "`
echo 'adminAuth: {
        type: "credentials",
        users: [{
            username: "admin",
' >/home/fs/node-red-data/auth.js
echo "      password: \"$encrypt\",
            permissions: \"*\"
" >> /home/fs/node-red-data/auth.js
echo '        }]
    }, 
' >> /home/fs/node-red-data/auth.js
cat /home/app/settings.js.head /home/fs/node-red-data/auth.js /home/app/settings.js.tail > /home/app/settings.js

echo OK

#!/bin/bash

. /home/engines/functions/params_to_env.sh
parms_to_env
if ! test -z $view_password
 then
encrypt=`echo $view_password | node-red-admin hash-pw | cut -f2 -d" "`
echo "httpNodeAuth: {user:\"$view_username\",pass:\"$encrypt\"},
      httpStaticAuth: {user:\"$view_username\",pass:\"$encrypt\"},
" >/home/fs/node-red-data/view_auth.js

cat /home/app/settings.js.head /home/fs/node-red-data/auth.js /home/fs/node-red-data/view_auth.js /home/app/settings.js.tail > /home/app/settings.js

fi
echo OK
